rows.label: qst000510_msg0001
rows.name:
You met my father and mother?
Honestly, that brother of mine...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0006
rows.name:
If there's a chance we can
persuade them, I think we should.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0007
rows.name:
I want you to be happy,
so if we can avoid it, I
don't want to elope...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0008
rows.name:
But it could just be a pretext
to get me to come back.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't think my father
will ever forgive us...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0010
rows.name:
I might never be able to
see you again, Norman-san!

rows.label: qst000510_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't think I can make you
happy while your family is
still worried about you.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0014
rows.name: Alright. Let's go back to the city.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0016
rows.name: No, I'm the one who should be sorry.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0017
rows.name: Everyone, thank you for telling us.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0018
rows.name:
We're going to try one more time.
So we don't have any regrets!
